summary:
Experienced strategist with strong interpersonal and analytic skills. Meticulous with data, undertakes complex assignments, meets tight deadlines and delivers superior performance. Applies strong financial planning and analytical skills to inform senior management of key trends and reduce costs, with particular expertise in sales, marketing, branding, client relations and finance. 

At present working as a the International Trade Manager for Mills Nutrients, a fertilizer label, overseeing the clock work of the accounting and logistics and  in charge of promoting the brand and pursuing strategic alliances. Helped in the incubation and start-up of two successful fashion brands, delivering the highest standards of advisory services for corporate investments and individuals' wealth management.

MIlls Nutrients is a fertilizer producer for agriculture. Opportuno is a luxury women's brand now with a world wide presence. East Club London is a men's clothing brand in whats now a luxury niche and constantly over-performing its sales.  BNP Paribas is a financial institution where I was tasked with bringing in more business, resolving procedural hurdles to mitigate costs and engage new customers

Specialties: Marketing, data analytics, client relations, financial markets, financial instruments, admin,  management, sales, fund raising, events; fluent in Spanish and English, working knowledge in Dutch, French and German

profile_positions.description:
International Trade Manager
•	Processed and obtained the licenses for the various product lines for entry into six countries.
•	Establishing working relationship from re-marketing, social media, and my personal network to set a brand presence, distribution channels and end customers. 
•	Monitor financials and gathering data, to create quarterly reports and benchmarking metrics. 
•	Assist with the book-keeping and accounting duties for the tax declarations and internal controls. 
•	Administer the CRM tool for invoices, budgets and set up a stock control tool for efficient logistics operations. 
•	Laisse with the chemical engineers to tailor make solutions for my clients.
•	Made a preliminary valuation of the company for its eventual sale or initial public offering.
•	Learned and gained practical knowledge of the chemistry and physics of fertilizers, from their formulation and effects on crops; obtained valuable knowledge in the operations of a worldwide logistics chain and was able to hone my marketing expertise in a new industry.
profile_positions.title: International Trade Manager

profile_positions.description:
OPPORTUNO B.V. – www.opportuno.nl
Financial and Strategy Manager – April 2017 – Present
Responsible for operations, finance, and business development at this women’s clothing line start-up:
•	Pitches to prospects and relations with existing clients with emphasis on the pricing and delivery 
         negotiations.
•	Liaising with agents and press for advertising and marketing strategies.
•	General ledger, book-keeping, payments, budgeting, forecasting and reporting for tax authorities and creditors.
•	Analysis of pricing strategy: reviewing fixed costs and forecasting income.
•	Tracking budgets to maximize profit and reduce costs for collection and campaign development.
•	Processing of invoices and payments.
profile_positions.title: Finance and Strategy

profile_positions.description:
First employee hired to manage operations of a nascent luxury men’s clothing line 

	Responsible for all aspects of the company’s development, including the day-to-day financial and operational management of the company. 
	Create a marketing strategy for the brand’s launch , promote and manage all aspects of the company’s operations. 
	Successfully position the brand in a competitive market niche, achieving financial break-even in two years of operations.
	Measure performance, generate financial statements and report results to investors and for tax purposes.
	Review performance metrics from analytic tools including google, pay advertising and free press, create page descriptions, and ad campaigns for search engine optimization and internal marketing reports. 
	Design and carry out a road map for East Club’s marketing and PR strategies: optimize the positioning and marketing of the brand, engage general and specialized media, promote the brand to retailers, customers, and the press. 
	Market to buyers and prospecting in trade shows for wholesale, securing orders so far for three future collections.
	Create an inventory database in order to itemize and control all products 
	Develop internal systems to ensure streamlined production, from the purchase of materials, design, manufacturing, sampling and distribution.
profile_positions.title: Business Development and Operations Manager

profile_positions.description:
Member of a horizontal department across all business units to monitor, strategize and communicate performance. Established annual budgets, monitored the commercial team’s activities and produced income forecasts. 
	Prepared quarterly reports on liquidity forecasts, macro indicators and budget goals. Highlighted trends and provided intelligence to management; developed recommendations on product delivery and execution plans.
	Responsible for developing and presenting monthly marketing reports to senior executive team; recommended re-evaluation of strategies; suggested alternate products to secure longer term relationships with key customers.
	Developed a client-based activity-monitoring tool; improved and simplified client data review for the preparation of the monthly pipeline analysis bettering our estimates on budget goals.  
	Gathered data, produced metrics, and prepared presentations in order to benchmark competitor banks, generating league tables, product penetration to find areas where opportunities existed for improvement. 
	Designed and administered a client database, making it available to all relationship managers with marketing materials, updated financial statements of the clients and key macroeconomic trends.  
	Assisted the Head of Communications in creating advertisement campaigns for the Netherlands, wrote the press releases and internal memos.
profile_positions.title: Client Marketing

profile_positions.location: Colombia, Panama, USA, Caiman, Switzerland, Monaco
profile_positions.description:
Recruited to train as a private banker to introduce new clients for the wealth management services of the Bank for Colombia, Ecuador and Venezuela. Oversaw new business development and client management.
	Introduced clients to the Bank to manage their investment portfolios: responsible for increasing assets under management by USD 100 million.  
	Developed an innovative self-loan vehicle to enable clients to use their investment portfolios as collateral to fund working capital needs for corporate business ventures.
	Conducted research and prepared internal and for client reports on economic, market and political trends in Colombia and global markets to correlate for devising investment strategies.
profile_positions.title: Private Banker
